overview: Boris Borchert is a social media expert and editor working currently for ImmobilienScout24. He is in the board of the german journalist organization DJV Berlin. After studying law he decided to become a journalist starting with voluntary service in a mobile communication company. He worked there as an editor and content manager. During that time he engaged himself for the marketing of the Humboldt University and the Berlin Museum of natural History in Berlin before joining the onlinemarketing team at Immobilienscout Scout GmbH in 2007.
